name: lofersil-landing-page
description: LOFERSIL Landing Page - Static TypeScript site for Vercel deployment

scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:css && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist/scripts && mkdir -p dist/locales && cp index.html dist/ && cp privacy.html dist/ && cp terms.html dist/ && cp robots.txt dist/ && cp sitemap.xml dist/ && cp site.webmanifest dist/ && cp browserconfig.xml dist/ && cp -r assets/images dist/assets/ && cp src/locales/*.json dist/locales/ && cp node_modules/dompurify/dist/purify.min.js dist/ && rm -rf dist/modules && mv dist/index.js dist/scripts/ && rm -rf dist/types.js dist/validation.js || true

author: LOFERSIL
